root.name: Crosswords
root.description: Crosswords brings the tradition of Stand Alone's award-winning PalmOS "Crosswords Puzzle" was remade for the iPhone in 2008.It was one of the first games released for the AppStore when it launched and continues to evolve along with the iOS platform over the last 4 years. It's most recent update added support for the third generation iPad's retina screen.After the success of the iOS version, it was later ported to the Mac and Android platforms.
